headline: Lockheed Martin : Army Conducts First Soldier-Led Limited User Test of Lockheed Martin’s Precision Strike Missile
summary: DALLAS, December 11, 2024 - The U.S. Army successfully completed its first Soldier-led Limited User Test of Lockheed Martin's Precision Strike Missile in a milestone flight test at White Sands...

headline: Boeing Clinches a $450M Contract to Support the F-15 JSI Program
summary: BA is set to provide for the acquisition of radars, self-protection systems and mission computer units for the F-15 JSI program.

headline: HII Secures $6.7B Contract to Provide Electronic Warfare Support
summary: Huntington Ingalls, with its recent contract win, is set to provide electronic warfare engineering and technical services support for the U.S. Air Force.

headline: Lockheed Martin Wins a $375.9M Contract for Black Hawk Helicopters
summary: LMT's business unit, Sikorsky, secures a contract to provide full funding for UH-60M and HH-60M Black Hawk helicopters.
